messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Ultimate Offer.
What does the Monthly Ultimate Offer include?
Can you tell me the benefits of the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
What resources are provided in the Monthly Ultimate Offer?

The Monthly Ultimate Offer includes 200GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes, and 1200 off-net minutes for Rs. 1390 including tax. It also provides a free EFU Life Insurance subscription. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *345*98#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Ultimate Offer.
How can I activate the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
What is the process to subscribe to the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
How do I get the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
To activate the Monthly Ultimate Offer, dial *345*98#. The offer includes 200GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes, and 1200 off-net minutes, along with free EFU Life Insurance for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Ultimate Offer.
Who can subscribe to the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
Can all Telenor customers avail the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Ultimate Offer.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Ultimate Offer.
How long is the Monthly Ultimate Offer valid?
What is the validity period for the Monthly Ultimate Offer?
For how many days does the Monthly Ultimate Offer remain active?
The Monthly Ultimate Offer is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be informed once the package expires. Re-subscribing will extend the validity by an additional 30 days.
